message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $140, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm not willing to go below my minimum price, Bob. I can do $129, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand you're not willing to go below your minimum price, but I'm still trying to save a bit of money. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
I've already said I can go as low as $129, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Would you like to meet me at that price?
